revised_title: DNA Methylation and Gene Regulation: The Role of MyoD1 in Cellular Determination
tldr: This article investigates the role of DNA methylation in cellular determination, specifically focusing on the MyoD1 gene. The authors demonstrate that the methylation of cytosine residues within developmentally important genes may play a role in cellular determination. They also show that MyoD1, a gene involved in myogenesis, is subject to methylation control in vitro, which may have implications for the establishment of immortal cell lines and tumors.
